title: Linux service Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux service command, learn how to manage system services, and troubleshoot service issues with practical examples.

verify.name: Verify the service command usage
verify.hint: The `service` command usage information should be displayed when running `sudo service --help`.

steps.title: Manage System Services Using the service Command

verify.name: Verify the service command usage for managing services
verify.hint: The `service` command should be able to start, stop, and check the status of the Apache2 service.
